docblock.description: Called during validation operations, before validation. Please note that custom validation rules can be defined in $validate.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if validate operation should continue, false to abort

docblock.description: beforeValidate is called before a model is validated, you can use this callback to add behavior validation rules into a models validate array. Returning false will allow you to make the validation fail.

tag.name: return
tag.description: False or null will abort the operation. Any other result will continue.

docblock.description: afterSave is called after a model is saved.

tag.name: param
tag.description: True if this save created a new record

docblock.long-description: Test case status WorkflowComponent::STATUS_DISAPPROVED and comment empty
